bibl.title: P. Artemid.: Text, Proem, Koiné.
bibl.note: The proem is of the same date as the papyrus itself, and is therefore 75 years or a century later than the text giving the description of Spain. It was perhaps composed in the workshop which produced the papyrus.

bibl.title: Intorno al Papiro di Artemidoro. I. Contesto culturale, lingua, stile e tradizione. Atti del Convegno internazionale del 15 novembre 2008 presso la Scuola Normale Superiore di Pisa

bibl.seg: COLVIN Stephen, P. Artemid.: Text, Proem, Koiné.

Claudio GALLAZZI, Bärbel KRAMER e Salvatore SETTIS, con Agostino SOLDATI (a cura di), Intorno al Papiro di Artemidoro. I. Contesto culturale, lingua, stile e tradizione. Atti del Convegno internazionale del 15 novembre 2008 presso la Scuola Normale Superiore di Pisa = Colloquium (Milano, 2009) pp. 69-78.

The proem is of the same date as the papyrus itself, and is therefore 75 years or a century later than the text giving the description of Spain. It was perhaps composed in the workshop which produced the papyrus.
